title: Help me please
body:
I just finished my rank game, i couldnt go to the stats, and now im stuck in the black screen to reconnect to the game for some reason, I tried "initiate full repair" still doesnt work, I logged off and then came back and it automatically reconnects me and I still  end up in the black screen

HELP

replies.body: This is most likely happening due to what we call a 'ghost game'. Basically, the server never told your game client that the match was over. Unfortunately, the only way to get these ghost games to clear up. Have you been able to get back in a game yet?
